description.value:
Void Accustomed: Due to their strange and unnatural childhood, the void born are used to the vagaries of changing gravity.

They are immune to space travel sickness. In addition, zero- or low-gravity environments are not considered Difficult Terrain for void born characters.

system.benefit: You are immune to space travel sickness. Zero- or low-gravity environments are not Difficult Terrain for you.
system.notes: Immune to space sickness, no difficult terrain in zero/low-G
